column4: I do understand it's very hectic in here, does someone know the answer of my question?

I'm using gutsy gibbon on a laptop with an intel pentium M processor, how do I control the CPU mhz, I have a 1.86ghz proc. and the CPU freq applet on the taskbar is showing 1.60ghz, how can I adjust it?
that's just what the proc is running at, at the moment, i'm sure it can use it's peak when it needs to
you don't want your proc running at full capacity all the time, it'll burn out that way
